DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study determine safety effectiveness 650 mg 1300 mg acetaminophen extend release give three time day compare placebo , relief sign symptom osteoarthritis hip knee period 12 week . Propoxyphene Hydrochloride capsule 65 mg use rescue medication subject experience inadequate pain relief . The primary efficacy assessment average change baseline final on-therapy visit WOMAN pain subscale score WOMAC physical function subscale scare , subject 's average global assessment response therapy final on-therapy visit . Safety assessment study visit consist monitor adverse event , vital sign , study joint assessment clinical laboratory determination . The hypothesis 1950 mg per day and/or 3900 mg per day acetaminophen extend release superior placebo relief sign symptom osteoarthritis hip knee respect three primary efficacy endpoint . Treatment consist either one 650 mg acetaminophen extend release caplet plus one placebo caplet ( acetaminophen 1950 mg group ) ; two 650 mg acetaminophen extend release caplets ( acetaminophen 3900 mg group ) ; two placebo caplets administer orally every eight hour 12 week .
